dialogue:
[header name:Caring Elder]
[color value:red]Consuming[color value:regular] 
is important to improve your 
[color value:blue]attributes.[color value:regular]

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Caring Elder]
How much you improve in an 
[color value:blue]attribute
[color value:regular] depends on how much 
you use each [color value:blue]card 
color.[color value:regular][endl]

[header name:Caring Elder]

[color value:blue]altar[color value:regular] next to me.
[endl][pause value:.5]
If you are [color value:pp]not focused,[color value:regular] just step on it and [color value:blue]press F.[color value:regular]
name: Elder 2
